title: Guys, I want to delete my account which reason should I put? Help!
body: I don't want to play this game anymore cuz it piss me off a lot

replies.body: The ticket topic is more of a convenience for players, we'll still make sure it gets fielded to the right team.  In this case, selecting account issue would be just fine if you're certain about wanting to delete the account.  If you want to just take a break or even disable it for a while, we can help with that as well!
I don't see it on the "Choose a request type" about account issue.
I'd say do "I need help recovering my account."  This will get you fielded to the correct team as well as verify ownership which is a necessary step before proceeding with a deletion request.
